# Comexstats

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Package to query Brazilian foreign trade statistics from the Comex Stat system (comexstat.mdic.gov.br)

## Installation


``` r
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("fe-agronomia/Comexstats")
```
